description: The file defines a 'RatingOverlayFragment' class, which is a user interface component for post-playback content rating. It manages UI elements such as poster background, picture-in-picture placeholder, title, helper text, rating buttons (like, love, dislike), close button, and countdown timer. It interacts with a ViewModel for state management, handles focus navigation for remote controls, and responds to user actions and state updates.
